questions: What is a favorite memory you have together?

answers: We worked together at Pure Romance.
When she played with Chase a whole lot!
English class. I was playing the guitar. It was love at first stairway.

So many to choose from.  Number 1 was definitely <censored>.  Remember that time when we <censored>?!   Also at the top was that time when we were chasing each other around the pattern at Green County in a couple of beat up old Cessnas right after we soloed.

story: Jon and Kaleigh have both had a love of theater for a long time, so it's fitting that they first got to know each other while performing opposite each other in a musical. Since those first days on the stage in Mason, they've created many memories together and been through a lot of tough times and great ones. They're excited to celebrate a life together!
